import Fade from "react-reveal"; import { HideBetween, HideDuring, HideOn, HideScroll, } from "react-hide-on-scroll"; import Logo from "./Images/Logo.jpg" import "./styles.css" function About() { return(

About Me

My name is Kyle Tu. I am an aspiring software developer studying to get my Masters in Artificial Intelligence at San Jose State University. I mainly use React to code webpages but I am have experience coding in Java, Python, C++, etc.

Earing my Major in Applied Mathematics and Minor in Computer Science, I know my way around numbers and algorithms. Through obtaining my Masters in Artificial Intelligence, I hope to sharpen my software engineering skills and grow as a developer.

Contact Details:

kaytoo2022@gmail.com

(510)612-3222

{/*

kaytoo2022@gmail.com

(510)612-3222

*/}

Resume:

Download Resume
) } export default About;
